KnowledgeBase.Title: isEven
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isInteger isZero integer isInexact isOdd isNegative isPositive isNull isExact

Function.Description: The isEven function returns true if its argument is an even Integer with no fraction; otherwise false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isEven function returns true if its argument that can be expressed as an Integer with no fraction with losing significance, otherwise false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isExact function returns true if its argument is an even Integer with fraction; otherwise false is returned.

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the number is an Even Integer, false is returned otherwise
